cause.description:
Special Olympics is a global nonprofit organization serving 3.1 million people with intellectual disabilities, with a presence in over 175 countries worldwide. With seven regional offices, we are constantly expanding to add new Programs in every part of the world – which is why we can say with all truth that “the sun never sets on the Special Olympics movement.”
1. Special Olympics is composed of passionate, committed people, who recognize the value and unique gifts of people with intellectual disabilities
2. Through sports, Special Olympics athletes are creating communities of acceptance and dignity for all of us.
cause.mission: To provide year-round sports training and athletic competition for children and adults with intellectual disabilities
cause.name: Special Olympics
